To do the deployment with the command "ant" you have to do the following steps:

1. Go to the "Source" tab.
From here you'll get the url and the user to input into the SVN Checkout . 

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/DeploymentWithAnt/GoogleCodeSource.png" align="left" />

2. To enable the deployment, you must have the TortoiseSVN program installed or another SVN clients.
[http://tortoisesvn.net/downloads To download the TortoiseSVN click  here]

3. Create a folder where you want to save the project.

4. Inside the created folder make click in the right mouse button and select the SVN Checkout... option.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/DeploymentWithAnt/SVNCheckout.png" align="left" />

5. Enter a URL obtained in step 1 and click on OK button.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/DeploymentWithAnt/SVNCheckoutWindow.png" align="left" />

6. Enter the SVN username and the SVN password obtained in the step 1.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/DeploymentWithAnt/SVNAutentication.png" align="left" />

7. The project creates in the folder.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/DeploymentWithAnt/GoogleCodeFolder.png" align="left" />

8. Make double click in the trunk folder.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/DeploymentWithAnt/GoogleCodeTrunkFolder.png" align="left" />

9. Edit the build.properties file and save the changes.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/DeploymentWithAnt/GoogleCodeBuildPropertiesFile.PNG" align="left" />

10. You must have the ANT program installed.
[http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi To download the Apache-ANT click  here]

11. In the folder lib of the apache-ant installed, add file ant-salesforce.jar. To get the ant-salesforce.jar file go to the ant folder.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/DeploymentWithAnt/GoogleCodeAntFolder.PNG" align="left" />


12. To excecute the ANT command you must open the console.

13. Go to the directory which contains the build.properties and buil.xml files, in the trunk folder.

14. Excecute the ANT command.
<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/DeploymentWithAnt/GoogleCodeAntCommand.PNG" align="left" />

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/DeploymentWithAnt/GoogleCodeDeploy.PNG" align="left" />

15. At the end of the deployment you will see this screen.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/DeploymentWithAnt/GoogleCodeAntCommandFinished.png" align="left" />
